forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: More clouds than sun. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some early morning breaks in the overcast, otherwise cloudy. High 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 55F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 39F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 17C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 62F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low around 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High around 15C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 59F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low near 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 61F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
